column1: https://www.dr-rath-foundation.org/2020/04/nobel-prize-winning-scientist-who-discovered-hiv-says-coronavirus-was-created-in-laboratory/?fbclid=IwAR1ne96bky-9rffTeMlXkhN9n4FO3wGhmVEbufDyzCTgLxoGN6DxLgmkulM - Professor Luc Montagnier, who has been awarded the Nobel Prize in 2008 for HIV, claims that the origins of the Coronavirus was lab-based Well then... "Draw your own conclusions" is what I have to say to that
